item.title: Two U.S. soldiers and an interpreter killed in suspected Islamic State attack in Syria
item.description: Two Army soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed by a suspected Islamic State attacker who targeted a convoy of U.S. and Syrian forces.

item.title: Judge says Comey evidence was wrongfully retained, creating hurdle for new charges
item.description: Prosecutors must return evidence seized from a key figure in the dismissed criminal case against former FBI Director James Comey, a federal judge has ...

item.title: U.S. Veterans Affairs agency plans as many as 35,000 health-care job cuts this month, Washington Post reports
item.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs plans to eliminate as many as 35,000 health-care positions this month, the Washington Post reported, citing an inte...

item.title: Trump says 'no big deal' after Jeffrey Epstein photos showing him released
item.description: Democrats on the House Oversight Committee released the photos to pressure the Trump administration to release files about Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: TSA is giving airline passenger data to ICE for deportation push: NYT
item.description: The program led to the arrest in Boston of Any Lucía López Belloza, a college student who was deported to Honduras, the report said.
